constructor.details: Example for deploying contract :     _pollName: "What is your favorite colour ?",     _options: ["Red", "Blue", "black", "Green"],     _duration: 1  (poll will be active for 1 day).

params._duration: is the number of days for which poll will be active.
params._options: is an array of strings which contains options for poll.
params._pollName: is the name of Poll and it is a string. For example, "What is your favourite colour".

params.voteTo: index of option to which user wants to cast vote.

methods.constructor: Constructor initializes the contract with _pollName, _options and duration.

result().notice: Function to calculate option with maximum vote.

vote(uint256).notice: function for user to cast a vote. A user can cast vote only once while poll is active.Note that indexing starts from zero.

userdoc.notice: Following is the PollContract which is used to set up a single choice Poll.         The owner of Contract initializes the Poll with PollName and options and duration in days for which poll is active.         A user can vote once to one option in the duration when the poll is active.
